title: unesco_heritage_Los_Katíos_National_Park
text:
Name: Los Katíos National Park. short_description:

Extending over 72,000 ha in north-western Colombia, Los Katios National Park comprises low hills, forests and humid plains. An exceptional biological diversity is found in the park, which is home to many threatened animal species, as well as many endemic plants.

. date_inscribed: 1994. danger: 0. date_end: 2015. longitude: -77.146271. latitude: 7.803975. area_hectares: 72000. category_long: Natural. category_short: N. Country name: Colombia. Region: Latin America and the Caribbean. iso_code: co. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
